item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 at 4:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Greenland ‘not for sale’, says Danish PM after Trump call for US to buy it
2. New jets help passengers avoid congestion at hub airports
3. Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announces resignation
4. [Opinion] Dungeons & Dragons shows that modish guff doesn’t serve diversity and inclusion
5. US corporate bankruptcies hit 14-year high as interest rates take toll
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 at 4:30 PM UTC
